text: The first season of Power Couple premiered on Tuesday, April 12, 2016 at 10:30 p.m. on RecordTV. The show features eight celebrity couples living under one roof and facing extreme challenges that will test how well they really know each other. Each week, a couple will be eliminated until the last couple wins the grand prize. Laura Keller & Jorge Sousa won the competition over Simony & Patrick Souza with 82.40% of the public vote and took home the R$697.000 prize they accumulated during the show. Simony & Patrick received a brand new car as the runners-up. After beating Laura & Jorge in a face-off challenge during the live final, Simony & Patrick had the opportunity to reward an eliminated couple with R$20.000. They choose Gretchen & Carlos. Gretchen was also revealed to be Brazil's favorite contestant after winning the real time fan vote through Twitter, receiving another R$20.000, bringing her cash winnings to R$40.000.Com 82,4% dos votos, Laura Keller e Jorge vencem o "Power Couple Brasil" ==Cast== ===Couples=== {| class= "wikitable sortable" style="text- align: center; margin:auto; align: center" |- ! width=135| Celebrity ! width=150| Occupation ! width=135| Partner ! width=150| Occupation ! width=125| Status |- | Popó | Professional boxer | Emilene Juarez | Physiotherapist | bgcolor=FA8072| Eliminated 1st |- | Mário Velloso | Singer | Pietra Bertolazzi | Model | bgcolor=FA8072| Eliminated 2nd |- | Túlio Maravilha | Former football player | Cristiane Maravilha | Businesswoman | bgcolor=FA8072| Eliminated 3rd |- | Gretchen | Singer | Carlos Marques | Construction entrepreneur | bgcolor=FA8072| Eliminated 4th |- | Andréia Sorvetão | Former Paquita | Conrado | Singer | bgcolor=FA8072| Eliminated 5th |- | Gian | Singer | Tati Moreto | Blogger | bgcolor=FA8072| Eliminated 6th |- | Simony | Singer & TV host | Patrick Silva | Engineer | bgcolor=D1E8EF| Runner-up |- | Laura Keller | Actress | Jorge Sousa | Businessman | bgcolor=73FB76| Winners |- |} ==Future appearances== In 2017, Conrado (from Andréia & Conrado) appeared in A Fazenda 9, he finished in 11th place. In 2018, Popó (from Emilene & Popó) appeared in Dancing Brasil 3, he finished in 14th place. In 2019, Túlio Maravilha (from Cristiane & Túlio) and Jorge Sousa (from Laura & Jorge) appeared in A Fazenda 11, Túlio finished in 14th place, and Jorge finished in 12th place. ==The game== ;Key {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center; font-size:90%; width:100%; line-height:13px;" |- | width="15%" | Men's challenge bet | width="15%" | Women's challenge bet | width="15%" | the challenge (adds the betting sum) | width="15%" | the challenge (deducts the betting sum) | width="15%" | Won couples' challenge (adds R$20.000) |} ===Challenges' results=== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center; font-size:85%; width:100%; line-height:15px;" |- !
